title: Les Halles

=============================

The Painting
------------

/Les Halles/, by the naturalist painter LÃƒÂ©on Lhermitte, represents the main
market of Paris at the end of the nineteenth century. It was ordered in 1889
for the City Hall of Paris.

It was stored for a long time at the museum Petit Palais of Paris, and was
restored in 2014 and lent to the museum of Civilization of QuÃƒÂ©bec.

About this image
----------------

This image is a high resolution photograph or scan of the painting, taken
during the restoration, which was published on zoom.it, where it could be
downloaded by pieces and combined back to one piece.

More information
----------------

You can find more information:

* about the painter on [Wikipedia][wp];
* about the painting on [the city of Paris' website][paris].
